title: daily_water_reserve_two_tanks_near_full
summary: Two water storage tanks nearly full, prepared as daily reserve due to dry and hot daytime conditions.
description: This record documents the status of two water storage tanks that are nearly full. Water is reserved daily in advance because daytime conditions are dry with strong sunlight, increasing water demand for vegetable plots and farm operations.

operation_context.environment_condition: dry daytime air and strong sunlight
operation_context.usage_plan: support vegetable plots and routine farm activities
